data.title: Famous birthdays list for today, August 3, 2024 includes celebrities Martin Sheen, Evangeline Lilly
data.meta_description: Martin Sheen and Evangeline Lilly share a birthday today. Check out our photo slideshow of celebrities and other famous people with birthdays on August 3, 2024 and find out a fun fact about each person.
data.text:
Birthday wishes go out to Martin Sheen, Evangeline Lilly and all the other celebrities with birthdays today. Check out our slideshow below to see photos of famous people turning a year older on August 3rd and learn an interesting fact about each of them.

Top celebrity birthdays on August 3, 2024

Actor Martin Sheen turns 84

Fun fact: Was the voice of the narrator in ‘JFK’

TV personality Martha Stewart turns 83

Fun fact: Her middle name is Helen

Director John Landis turns 74

Fun fact: Directorial credits include ‘Blues Brothers’ and ‘Spies Like Us’

Rocker James Hetfield turns 61

Fun fact: Appeared as a police officer n the Netflix film ‘Extremely Wicked, Shockingly Evil and Vile’

DJ Spinderella turns 53

Fun fact: Used to date former NBA player Kenny Anderson

Quarterback Tom Brady turns 47

Fun fact: Was inducted into the Patriots Hall of Fame earlier this summer

Actress Evangeline Lilly turns 45

Fun fact: One of her first film appearances was a small part in the film ‘Freddy vs Jason’

Check out other celebrities who were born in Canada.

More celebrities with birthdays today

Singer Beverly Lee of The Shirelles is 83. Actor JoMarie Payton (“Family Matters”) is 74. Actor Jay North (“Dennis the Menace”) is 73. Actor Philip Casnoff (“Oz,” “Strong Medicine”) is 70. Actor John C. McGinley (“Scrubs”) is 65. Bassist Lee Rocker (Stray Cats) is 63. Actor Lisa Ann Walter (“Abbott Elementary”) is 63. Singer Ed Roland of Collective Soul is 61. Actor Isaiah Washington (“Grey’s Anatomy,” ″Soul Food”) is 61. Keyboardist Dean Sams of Lonestar is 58. Guitarist Stephen Carpenter of Deftones is 54. Actor Brigid Brannagh (“CSI,” “Army Wives”) is 52. Actor Michael Ealy (“Think Like A Man,” ″Barbershop”) is 51. Violinist Jimmy De Martini of Zac Brown Band is 48. Actor Mamie Gummer (“The Good Wife”) is 41. Singer Holly Arnstein of Dream is 39. Actor Georgina Haig (“Once Upon a Time”) is 39. Bassist Brent Kutzle of OneRepublic is 39. Rapper D.R.A.M. is 36.

Other popular or historical birthdays on August 3rd

PD James, crime writer

Tony Bennett, singer

Ryan Lochte, Olympic gold medalist (40)

with The Associated Press
